title: Current General Activity, Perceptions of Respondents for their Firm; Percent of Respondents Reporting Increases for Federal Reserve District 3: Philadelphia
notes: Current General Activity, Perceptions of Respondents for their Firm reports the change in general business activity of their company based on perceptions of their responses compared to the previous month for reporting service firms. The General Business Activity is the broadest measure of the Nonmanufacturing Business Outlook Survey. For more information about this release from the Federal Reserve Bank of Philadelphia, visit: http://www.philadelphiafed.org/research-and-data/regional-economy/nonmanufacturing-business-outlook-survey/ .
